data.question: What is the empirical formula and formula weight of the synthesized [NH4][Zn(HCOO)3] framework?
At what temperature and using what radiation was the single-crystal cell measurement of framework 1 collected?
What was the pressure range studied for the high-pressure single-crystal X-ray diffraction data collection of framework 1?
How was the pressure inside the diamond anvil cell measured during the high-pressure experiments of framework 1?
What was the purpose of using a Berkovich tip in the nanoindentation measurements of framework 1?
data.answer: To determine the Young’s modulus (E) and hardness (H) of the framework

data.question: What computational method was used to perform the calculations for framework 1, and what was the main purpose of these calculations?
data.answer: CP2K-QuickStep program at the GGA-DFT level with the PBE functional corrected for dispersion interactions, to understand the effect of pressure on the framework

data.question: Based on the nanoindentation methodology, why might the {010} facet of framework 1 exhibit more compliance and deformation compared to the {002} facet?
data.answer: Because the indentation stress is at an angle of 90.00o with two of the formate ligands when indenting along the b axis, leading to more compliance and deformation in this direction

data.question: True or False: The high-pressure experiments for framework 1 were conducted up to 4 GPa according to the computational study.
True or False: The nanoindentation experiments on framework 1 were performed on natural facets only.
True or False: The crystal system of framework 1 remains hexagonal up to a pressure of 1.35 GPa.
What was the result of the crystal system transition observed at 1.35 GPa for framework 1?
data.answer: It transitioned from hexagonal to monoclinic

data.question: How does the nanoindentation methodology account for the anisotropic properties of single crystals like framework 1?
data.answer: By representing the modulus obtained from nanoindentation as an ‘indentation modulus’ which accounts for the effects of anisotropy

data.question: True or False: The Young’s modulus and hardness of framework 1 were determined using the Continuous Stiffness Measurement (CSM) module.
True or False: The computational study of framework 1 used a 2x2x2 simulation cell comprising of 288 atoms.
What was the main finding from the analysis of the variation of individual lattice parameters with pressure for framework 1?
data.answer: The a and b axes are highly compressible, but the c axis shows a rare example of negative linear compressibility

data.question: True or False: The hydrogen atom positions of the formate ligands in framework 1 were placed geometrically and constrained to ride on their host.
True or False: The nanoindentation experiments were performed on both natural and artificially created facets of framework 1.
What was the significance of the crystal cracking at approximately 1.35 GPa during the high-pressure experiments of framework 1?
data.answer: It indicated a phase transition from hexagonal to monoclinic, although the monoclinic phase could not be solved successfully

data.question: True or False: The nanoindentation experiments on framework 1 were able to perfectly simulate uniaxial stress conditions.
What was the role of paraffin in the high-pressure experiments conducted on framework 1?
data.answer: Paraffin was used as a hydrostatic medium in the diamond anvil cell
